WebLLM_iOS_App/.description: Main app folder for iOS Files app organization

index.html.purpose: Primary chat interface - tap to open in Safari
index.html.ios_specific: Added to Home Screen for native app experience

index.css.ios_specific: Enhanced touch interactions and iOS visual design

index.js.purpose: iOS-optimized WebLLM engine with mobile performance tweaks
index.js.ios_specific: Memory management, Safari compatibility, haptic feedback

README_iOS.md.ios_specific: Free app recommendations and Files app organization

ios-folder-structure.json.purpose: This file - shows exact iOS Files app organization

models/.description: AI model storage - requires 2.2GB free space

downloads/.description: Optional - for storing downloaded model files
downloads/.purpose: Temporary folder during model download process

temp/.description: Optional - iOS cache and temporary files
temp/.purpose: Browser cache and temporary processing files

step_1.details: Download or AirDrop the entire 'WebLLM_iOS_App' folder to your iPhone/iPad

step_2.details: Use iOS Files app to navigate to WebLLM_iOS_App folder

step_3.details: Long press on 'index.html' and select 'Share' â†’ 'Add to Home Screen'

step_4.details: App icon appears on Home Screen - tap to launch like native app

step_5.details: Tap 'Download' button in app to load 2.2GB AI model (one-time setup)

iOS_Compatibility.performance_notes: Older devices may experience slower AI responses due to memory constraints

iOS_Optimizations.memory_management: Automatic memory cleanup for iOS Safari limits
iOS_Optimizations.touch_optimization: Enhanced touch interactions and haptic feedback
iOS_Optimizations.battery_optimization: Reduced computational load for better battery life
iOS_Optimizations.files_app_integration: Seamless iOS Files app organization and sharing

iOS_Specific_Features.add_to_home_screen: Installs like native iOS app with full-screen experience
iOS_Specific_Features.haptic_feedback: iPhone vibrates on certain interactions for better UX
iOS_Specific_Features.safari_optimized: Specifically tuned for iOS Safari performance and limitations
iOS_Specific_Features.memory_warnings: Intelligent memory management with user-friendly warnings
iOS_Specific_Features.touch_friendly: Large touch targets optimized for finger navigation
iOS_Specific_Features.ios_keyboard: Optimized for iOS keyboard with return key shortcuts

daily_usage: Tap WebLLM app icon on Home Screen
App opens in full-screen mode (no Safari chrome)
Start chatting immediately with local AI
setup_process: Launch app and tap Download (one-time 2GB download)
